recipe.title: Celery, Radish, and Olive Salad
ingredients: 4 radishes, trimmed and cut into 1/8-inch-thick slices
instructions: Remove outer dark green ribs of celery and reserve for another use. Remove leaves and reserve in a bowl. Cut off and discard base of celery heart, then cut crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices and add to celery leaves along with remaining ingredients. Toss to coat.
